mapper.select: SELECT agent_id, merchant_number, merchant_name, trade_number as tradeNumber, batch_number as batchNumber, terminal_number as terminalNumber,pay_channel_id, DATE_FORMAT(traded_at, '%Y-%m-%d %T') tradedTimeStr, traded_status tradedStatus,poundage,amount, trade_type_id as types from trade_records WHERE id=#{id}
select IFNULL(pay_from_account,'无') payFromAccount, IFNULL(pay_into_account,'无') payIntoAccount from trade_transfer_repayment_records where id = #{id}
select IFNULL(account_name,'无') account_name , IFNULL(account_number,'无') account_number from trade_records where id = #{id}
SELECT profits_pay,current_agent_id cid,top_agent_id tid from profits where trade_record_id=#{id}
